summary: Diff implements Replicate/Proxy provider option, browser-based custom API generation with selectable Authorization header modes, and client-side-only persistence of new config fields. Backend only extends provider enum and supports storing requests with the new provider.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a Motoko state migration that remaps the old #CustomApi provider to the new #ReplicateOrProxy provider.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requests adding a new provider option and storing requests, but does not explicitly request a canister migration module or automatic remapping of existing provider values.

hallucinated_features.description: Custom API client substitutes a placeholder image URL when the endpoint returns raw image bytes or base64 instead of using/handling the returned image content.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 specifies the expected contract (JSON {prompt} -> JSON with image_url). Handling image bytes/base64 and returning a placeholder URL is additional behavior not requested.
